name: Unstoppable Hamster
description: Unstoppable Hamstet - is a story about a brave, unstoppable hamster that is forced to do battle with the living world in order to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 6.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 300 MB available space
